description: Python 代码质量检查钩子 - 在保存 Python 文件前自动检查代码风格

hooks.prompt: Check if the file being written/edited is a Python file (.py extension). If it is a Python file, validate the code quality using ruff or similar tools. Check for: 1) PEP 8 compliance, 2) Common errors (unused imports, undefined variables), 3) Code complexity. If issues are found, return a systemMessage with warnings but allow the operation (permissionDecision: allow). If the file is not a Python file, allow without checking. Read the user's configuration from .claude/python-dev-assistant.local.md to check if enable_hook is true (default: true). If enable_hook is false, skip the check.
